knimeNode.name: Service Table Output
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads the content of a table and makes it available to an external caller (e.g a Call Workflow node).

fullDescription.intro: This node simplifies orchestrating KNIME workflows using the Call Workflow node. It defines the output of a workflow, which callers such as the Call Workflow node receive and forward as a KNIME table.
fullDescription.option: A name for the output parameter(preferably unique). This name is exposed in the REST interface and in the Call Workflow node.
A description for the output parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.

ports.inPort: Table which defines the output of the workflow.
ports.outPort: The input table directly forwarded without changes.
